attr.title: Mindustry
attr.desc: Mindustry is a open-source sandbox tower-defense game focused on resource management and automation. Players design factories, build supply chains, and defend against waves of enemies using strategic planning and custom defenses. It offers campaign, multiplayer, and creative modes for diverse gameplay.
attr.inst: The port is ready to run for version 146 (latest release build). Just start the game. If you want to update the game to a different version, replace Mindustry.jar in the game directory. Your milage may vary, newer versions might not be compatible.
